lead_paragraph: Mark Cavendish showed he is not done just yet, hitting back at those people who think he is past his prime in his trademark caustic style after winning the opening stage of the Tour de France to take the yellow jersey on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Caustic Cavendish Proves He's Not Done Just Yet
headline.main: Caustic Cavendish Proves He's Not Done Just Yet
